================================================================
Document Header
Copy and paste this tag in the <head> section of your HTML.
================================================================
<script>
    var adsmtag = adsmtag || {};
    adsmtag.cmd = adsmtag.cmd || [];
    (function () {
        var script = document.createElement('script');
        script.async = true;
        script.type = 'text/javascript';
        script.src = 'https:' + '//rmb-adsembler.netdna-ssl.com/mnemonics/adsm.macro.7de08317-8afa-4213-aeec-e5945cba58ae.js';
        var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        node.parentNode.insertBefore(script, node);
    })();
</script>

================================================================
Document Body
Copy and paste these tags in the <body> section of your HTML.
Place each tag in the desired location of the associated <div>.
================================================================
<div id="cncpt-lb1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rec1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-sky1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-sky2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob3"></div>

================================================================
If tags are dynamically inserted into <body> they have to be
manually displayed using the below methods.

adsmtag.display(tag, definition);

string tag          The id of the <div> element.
string definition   The name of the definition.

Examples for the current tags and definitions in this file.
================================================================
adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb1', 'def-lb1');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-rec1', 'def-rec1');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-sky1', 'def-sky1');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-sky2', 'def-sky2');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob1', 'def-mob1');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob3', 'def-mob3');

================================================================
Once displayed a dynamically inserted tag needs to be refreshed.

adsmtag.refresh(tags);

array tags        List of ids of the <div> elements that need to
                  refreshed.

Example for displaying and refreshing a single tag.
================================================================
adsmtag.cmd.push(function () {
    adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb1', 'def-lb1');

    adsmtag.refresh(['cncpt-lb1']);
});

================================================================
Multiple dynamically inserted tags need to be refreshed at the
same time to ensure ad server targeting works correctly.

Example for displaying and refreshing multiple tags.
================================================================
adsmtag.cmd.push(function () {
    adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb1', 'def-lb1');
    adsmtag.display('cncpt-sky1', 'def-sky1');
    adsmtag.display('cncpt-sky2', 'def-sky2');

    adsmtag.refresh(['cncpt-lb1', 'cncpt-sky1', 'cncpt-sky2']);
});

================================================================
Tags can be manually constructed as long as each <div> is given
a unique id.

Definitions can be reused.

For continuous loading sites construct your own tags coupled with
an existing definition.

Example
================================================================
var tag = document.createElement('div');
tag.id = 'cncpt-rec1-7aw6dg';
document.body.appendChild(tag);

adsmtag.cmd.push(function () {
  adsmtag.display('cncpt-rec1-7aw6dg', 'def-rec1');
  adsmtag.refresh(['cncpt-rec1-7aw6dg']);
});
